details:
cJSON aims to be the dumbest possible parser that you can get your job done with. It&apos;s a single file of C, and a single header file.   %package devel Summary:        Development files for cJSON Requires:        = - Requires:       pkgconfig    %description devel The cjson-devel package contains libraries and header files for developing applications that use cJSON.    %prep %autosetup -n cJSON-

Security Fix(es):

cJSON 1.7.15 might allow a denial of service via a crafted JSON document such as {"a": true, "b": [ null,9999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999912345678901234567]}.(CVE-2023-26819)
